title: Last Week's Top Stories - Gender Reveal Party Ignites a Wildfire & Fox News Comes to Trump's Defense
itunes:title: Last Week's Top Stories - Gender Reveal Party Ignites a Wildfire & Fox News Comes to Trump's Defense
description:
Trevor covers a gender reveal party that sparked a massive wildfire, new diversity requirements for the Oscars, revelations President Trump downplayed COVID-19 and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
